question: What was C H Loknath famous for?
explanation: C. H. Loknath (14 August 1927 â€“ 31 December 2018) was an Indian Kannada language stage and cinema actor with more than 1000 plays and 650 films to his credit. Loknath is affectionately known as "Uncle Loknath" or "Uppinakayi" in the industry.
